philosophyModal_items_rapid_description: We work with the latest tools and agile methods to realize your projects in record time. Our AI-supported workflows accelerate development processes without loss of quality. We deliver results in days, not months! Oh yes, not only are the project times super fast, but the websites and applications that emerge from them also offer unmatched performance.
philosophyModal_items_accurate_descripti: Every detail is carefully selected and perfected. Everything that is superfluous is omitted: no bloat, no frills. You get exactly what you want and don't have to license expensive software just because you need a single feature. Precise requirements gathering, exact implementation - our solutions run accurately, like Swiss clockwork.
philosophyModal_items_services_descripti: From the first idea to the final implementation, we offer all services from one source: concept, design (UI/UX), development (frontend/backend), data modeling, content/SEO, hosting and more - all perfectly coordinated. In addition to our extensive portfolio, service also stands for absolute customer orientation. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
philosophyModal_items_perfectlyBalanced_: A work of art is perfect when you can't add anything more and can't remove anything more. The accurate implementation of your requirements is also conditioned by the perfect balance that we live in all our projects. We always keep costs, time and quality in harmony without compromises. Nevertheless, we leave room for innovations. Balanced, not forced.
philosophyModal_footer_missionDescriptio: At raspb, we unite these four principles into a unique work philosophy. We believe that true excellence can only be achieved by harmonizing all aspects. Every project is an opportunity to live this philosophy and create extraordinary results.
timeAsFactorModal_content_paragraph1: Time is a crucial factor in the digital world. While other agencies need months for implementation, we deliver first results within a few days thanks to our unique raspb method.
timeAsFactorModal_content_paragraph2: Our secret lies in the perfect combination of proven components, AI-supported development processes and the expertise of our team. Over the years we have developed an ecosystem of reusable components that enables us to implement even complex projects at record speed - without compromising on quality.
timeAsFactorModal_content_paragraph3: Agile development methods ensure that you can already give feedback during development and the end result exactly matches your ideas. This not only saves us time, but also ensures that the project is heading in the right direction from the start.
costAsFactorModal_content_paragraph1: No more nasty surprises! At raspb you receive transparent fixed prices without hidden costs from the start. Our intelligent online configurator determines a binding price even before the project begins - based on your specific requirements.
costAsFactorModal_content_paragraph2: Unlike many other providers, we have no monthly subscription fees or forced acceptance. You pay once for the development and receive your finished solution - completely in your possession. The first year of hosting and maintenance is already included, afterwards you can freely decide how to proceed with your project.
costAsFactorModal_content_paragraph3: Thanks to our efficient development methods and the raspb ecosystem, we can offer you an unbeatable price-performance ratio. Quality doesn't have to be expensive - with us you get both: highest standards at fair prices.
qualityAsFactorModal_content_paragraph1: Quality is non-negotiable at raspb. We exclusively use the latest web technologies and proven frameworks such as SvelteKit, TypeScript, TailwindCSS and Node.js. Every line of code is written by our experts and undergoes strict quality controls.
qualityAsFactorModal_content_paragraph2: Our self-developed modules and components have grown over the years and have been tested in countless projects. You benefit from this experience and receive solutions that not only work today, but are also future-proof. Performance, security and user-friendliness are always in focus.
qualityAsFactorModal_content_paragraph3: Through continuous code reviews, automated tests and the use of modern development tools, we ensure that your project meets the highest quality standards. The result: robust, scalable and low-maintenance solutions that will give you long-term satisfaction.

insights_kiSection_paragraph1: Artificial intelligence is an impressive tool that can speed up certain tasks by a factor of 10. It enables us to offer our tailor-made IT projects extremely efficiently (project duration, costs, etc.). But it does not work without people: creativity, experience, deep understanding of human needs, emotions... None of that can be replaced. In addition, you need experienced people who give the right instructions (prompts) to AI models and control their output. Sometimes AI delivers things you did not ask for (hallucinations) or results with serious errors. Even if many models can now create entire applications with a single prompt, a truly perfect result still requires a human expert.
insights_kiSection_paragraph2: Beyond prompt and context engineering (how can I best feed an AI so that exactly what I want comes out?), there are many other use cases where AI usage - in one form or another - is obvious: chatbots, AI agents, AI workflows, AI-enhanced automations, content creation, personal assistants, etc.
insights_kiSection_paragraph3: We discovered n8n as our automation platform. It allows us to implement scenarios from all areas of AI simply and efficiently. In addition to individual AI consulting services, we also offer the development of specialized agents and workflows that help you achieve your business goals and save costs. For our AI projects (and sometimes our custom development work), the standardized project process cannot be applied 100%. Project timelines are usually somewhat longer and closer coordination is required. And yet the unique raspb approach also delivers unique efficiency here. Results from AI projects are available much earlier than with other providers.
insights_projectInsights_titleFirst: What does a typical project at
insights_projectInsights_paragraph1: You can find the easy entry into your upcoming IT project on our website. By submitting the project configurator, the first major step is already done. To use the intelligent configurator in full, you only need to create a simple account (your email address is sufficient). The planned project then appears in your personal dashboard and can be refined there and ultimately submitted to us.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph2: You immediately receive an email with all details and can officially get started with a single click and commission us. This is where the journey begins! We immediately start working on your idea, develop a concept and a first prototype. For each project, we set up a dedicated inbox @raspb.de, which is used to create all accounts. You get access to the inbox and webmail access via browser. A GitHub account is set up to host the project code, and a dedicated site in Netlify is created. Depending on the project type, a Hygraph and auth0 account may be added. Access is typically via SSO from the GitHub account.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph3: Depending on the project scope and customer preferences, we refine your vision together in small workshops or web sessions. What we definitely want to avoid is scheduling many time-consuming meetings that usually provide little value. Your input from the configurator, along with our extensive experience from IT projects, enables us to understand and implement your idea or vision without endless loops. If you are still unsure between configuration and commissioning, have questions or need dialogue for other reasons, we are of course always available. Let's keep it efficient and lean - for everyone's benefit.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph4: You have full access to all systems - even during the project. We now develop your project within the created GitHub repository and provide it under a temporary address: <projektname>.netlify.app. You receive all access data directly and are informed about every step in your dashboard and via email.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph5: For CMS projects, we run a few iterations with you to align on the data model and other details. Simple websites usually do not require additional coordination rounds. You receive a first prototype within a few days. For more complex projects, such as special applications or custom development, it can take a bit longer until we present the first prototype.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph6: You now have enough time to test the prototype and give us feedback. Via the dashboard you also have the option at any time to provide additional project artifacts or influence the development.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph7: With the collected feedback, we move into revision and polishing. After a few more days, the go-live-ready final version is available. In coordination with you, we publish the result under the desired domain. Alternatively, we deliver the code to you or transfer the application to your preferred location. The project is then successfully completed.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph8: But that's not all. Our solutions are modular, flexible and expandable. The end of your project is the beginning of another...
insights_webtechnologien_subtitle: We have developed our own technology stack based on Jamstack that makes everything simpler, faster and more efficient without having to accept limitations.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz1: Jamstack stands for JavaScript, APIs and Markup and represents a modern architecture for web development. This technology enables us to build extremely fast, secure and scalable websites and web applications that deliver an exceptional user experience.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz2: The core of the Jamstack approach lies in pre-generation of content. Instead of generating pages dynamically on each request, all pages are generated at build time and delivered via a Content Delivery Network (CDN). This results in lightning-fast load times and improved performance. There are additional benefits as well.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz3: By decoupling frontend and backend, we can flexibly choose the best tools for each area. The frontend is delivered as static files, while dynamic functions are implemented via APIs. This architecture offers several decisive advantages:
insights_webtechnologien_absatz4:
Our Jamstack setup consists of modern and innovative tools and technologies that have proven themselves and are perfectly coordinated. A Node.js frontend application usually forms the foundation. Enriched with frameworks like Svelte/SvelteKit, TailwindCSS or DaisyUI and other npm packages, we create a frontend with endless possibilities.

We are not locked into a rigid construct, but can respond flexibly to integration requests or other technology questions. Almost anything is possible... Furthermore, we rely on TypeScript for type-safe programming and Netlify for deployment and hosting. This combination - supported by AI tools - enables us to develop robust and maintainable web applications optimized for both developers and end users.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz5: Headless CMS integration via GraphQL APIs enables our customers to manage content easily while the technical complexity remains hidden in the background. This lets you focus on your business while we ensure a technically flawless and future-proof solution.
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_sicher: Security: Less attack surface through static files + no classic server
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_perfor: Performance: Global CDN distribution + pre-rendered markup for minimal load times
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_skalie: Scalability (traffic): Automatic scaling without server administration (load balancing)
Scalability (app): Easy scaling of your application or website
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_entwic: Developer friendliness: Modern tools and workflows + dynamic community
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_kosten: Cost efficiency: Reduced development, hosting and maintenance costs

aboutUs_markusSection_paragraph1: As the founder and creative mind behind raspb Webservices, I bring almost two decades of experience in the digital world. My passion is developing tailor-made web solutions that are not only technically brilliant, but also user-friendly and future-proof.
aboutUs_markusSection_paragraph2: My approach combines proven development practices with innovative AI tools to realize projects more efficiently and with higher quality.

aboutUs_modals_aboutMe_title: With extensive practical experience, passion and great ideas - the perfect partner for your project!
aboutUs_modals_aboutMe_paragraph1:
Always technically interested, I started my journey into the digital world more than 20 years ago. Already during my computer science studies, I worked as a working student in technology companies, where I significantly supported marketing, maintained the company's online presence and created newsletters. For the following 10 years, I worked in various digital agencies: among other things, I built up a startup, was active in the SEO field for a corporation and helped a wide variety of companies achieve their business goals with strategic consulting, online marketing and application development...

At the beginning of my career, I completed my studies (business informatics) part-time and was able to prove even in my early years that I function well even in times of enormous stress and pressure. During this time, I learned an incredible amount and was able to get to know many very different business models and industries.

Looking for new, challenging opportunities, my career direction changed in 2018, and I have since been working in the field of enterprise software (with SAP) - in the broadest sense. A professionalization towards building digital workplaces for employees of larger companies, but also authorities, foundations, etc., has gradually taken place.

We have built and further developed dozens of portals (from intranets to supplier portals to special employee platforms).

Many systems, platforms and technologies (with and without SAP) were evaluated. So I have not only gained deep but also very broad insight into the IT needs of companies. In our fast-paced times, some things are already outdated before they have really proven themselves in use - but there are also many things that are always the same or very similar. My experience from various, very different IT projects enables me to develop most ideas and wishes quickly and cleanly. My skillset and know-how allow me to approach projects holistically (I take over concept/consulting, design, programming [frontend + backend] as well as all the administration around it). My profile is your competitive advantage. Solutions from a single source reduce project management efforts and ensure a coherent result. That this makes everything faster and cheaper, I don't need to mention here anymore.

aboutUs_header_subtitle:
At raspb Webservices, we combine human creativity with the power of artificial intelligence. As a modern web development studio, we create innovative digital solutions that bring your vision to life.

And who exactly is raspb? - Actually, it's just me and my AI crew ??
aboutUs_introSection_title: This is raspb - your innovative IT service provider
aboutUs_introSection_teaser1:
You can feel it intuitively - raspb is different. We are unconventional, we do things differently... We do them because they make sense, not because everyone does!
The demand for IT solutions for small and medium-sized companies remains strong. Large enterprises are also considering where and how IT budgets are allocated. Make or buy? Do it yourself or put it out to tender? The power of AI will shake up the labor market - and IT in particular - and brings many risks, but also opportunities.
aboutUs_introSection_teaser2: You don't have to identify and unlock the potential alone - bring an expert to your side. Not every AI promise turns out in practice to be what one imagined at the start. Many projects can be generated by a freely available AI with a single prompt. The results can be impressive. In the end, however, you still need experts to evaluate and contextualize the result - and to feed the AI model in a way that produces a secure, fast and maintainable outcome that creates joy instead of frustration. There are also countless low-code and no-code platforms and software providers out there - website builders - that promise professional results with little effort and cost. There are certainly use cases for that, but you should not forget that these are also just tools that must be operated. They cost time, effort, a learning curve and usually monthly fees. The results often turn out to be insufficient, and you give up individuality and flexibility. Unfortunately, the alternative - outsourcing the project to an agency or development studio - is usually very expensive and comes with long, stressful projects.
aboutUs_introSection_teaser3:
This is exactly where raspb steps in. In project implementation, AI supports us (websites, CMS, apps). We can also realize AI use cases in your company together (AI agents, workflows, automations, ...)

raspb is different, raspb is innovative, versatile, modern, fast, efficient, affordable, high quality, always there for you, personal, uncomplicated, flexible, reliable and so much more. Find out for yourself.
aboutUs_teamMembers_melinda_description: Melinda is the heart of our customer service and the guardian of our finances. With her calm and professional manner, she ensures that every customer is satisfied and all administrative processes run smoothly. She always finds the right balance between empathy and efficiency.
aboutUs_teamMembers_melinda_experience: With years of experience in customer support and accounting, she masters the complexities of both areas. She is proficient with accounting software, familiar with project management tools and has a deep understanding of customer needs.
aboutUs_teamMembers_melinda_personality: Organized, empathetic and solution-oriented. Melinda keeps a clear overview even in stressful situations and masters every challenge with a smile. She loves creating added value for our team and customers through structured processes.
faq_meta_description: Frequently asked questions about our web development, CMS, and AI services, and the project process. Learn more about our approach, technologies, and pricing.
faq_teaser: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our services, project process, and technical details. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.
faq_questions_q1_content: raspb develops websites, web applications (PWAs), and AI solutions specifically for small and medium-sized businesses. Instead of "never-ending IT projects," you get clearly defined product packages at fixed prices ‚Äì from a simple one-pager to complex business applications with login, roles, dashboards, and more. Conception, design, development, hosting, and optional maintenance all come from a single source ‚Äì without agency overhead and without website builder compromises.
faq_questions_q2_title: Who is raspb the right choice for ‚Äì and who isn‚Äôt it for?
faq_questions_q2_content: raspb is ideal for SMEs, freelancers, agencies with IT needs, associations, foundations, and social initiatives that want professional digital solutions but don‚Äôt have corporate budgets. You want to "finally get things done" and are looking for someone who takes responsibility rather than just advising. Less suitable are corporations with cumbersome processes, companies seeking classic strategy consulting without implementation, or projects that strictly require native apps, specialized legacy tech, or 24/7 enterprise support.
faq_questions_q3_title: How does raspb differ from traditional agencies?
faq_questions_q3_content:
• Fixed prices instead of hourly billing: You know the total price before the project starts.
  • Fewer meetings, more results: One point of contact, clear decisions, lean coordination.
  • Full-stack from a single source: Concept, UX, UI, frontend, backend, AI ‚Äì without ping-pong between departments.
  • AI-powered efficiency: Many tasks are accelerated with AI, but always supervised by an experienced expert.

You get agency-quality results, but faster, leaner, and at a significantly more attractive price.
faq_questions_q4_title: How does raspb differ from website builders, low-code tools, or "AI builds everything" generators?
faq_questions_q4_content: Website builders and low-code tools seem affordable at first glance ‚Äì in reality, you often pay with your own time, limited flexibility, and vendor lock-in. With raspb, you don‚Äôt need to learn any tools or AI: You define the goals and framework, and we deliver the finished solution. The code belongs to you, and the project can be extended, migrated, or further developed by others. Plus: raspb pays attention to topics like performance, GDPR compliance, security, and maintainability ‚Äì things that quickly fall by the wayside with "one-click websites."
faq_questions_q5_title: What does a website or web application cost approximately?
faq_questions_q5_content:
Prices are transparent and based on actual effort, not on "what the market will bear":
  • Simple one-pager / digital business card from approx. ‚Ç¨399
  • Classic corporate website with multiple pages from approx. ‚Ç¨999
  • CMS projects with self-manageable content roughly ‚Ç¨2,000‚Äì6,000
  • PWA / business applications with login & logic typically in the range of ‚Ç¨6,000‚Äì15,000

Specific quotes are generated through a project configurator, so you know exactly what's included ‚Äì and what it costs ‚Äì before you start.
faq_questions_q6_title: How does a typical project with raspb work ‚Äì from inquiry to go-live?
faq_questions_q6_content:
1. Getting to know each other & clarity: Brief conversation or form ‚Äì we understand the goal, budget framework, and conditions.
  2. Configuration & quote: Your project is assembled in the configurator, including fixed price and rough timeline.
  3. Implementation: Design & development in a continuous environment ‚Äì with progress updates in the customer dashboard.
  4. Fine-tuning & go-live: Feedback round, fine adjustments, technical launch.
  5. Optional: Maintenance & expansion: Ongoing support and further development through maintenance contracts upon request.
faq_questions_q7_title: What does "transparent fixed prices" mean specifically?
faq_questions_q7_content: Before the project starts, there is a clear fixed price ‚Äì including a realistic buffer. There are no "nasty surprises" from added items, as long as the agreed scope remains the same. If something changes along the way (e.g., additional features), it is openly discussed and calculated separately. If delays occur that are not caused by you, raspb bears the additional costs ‚Äì not you.
faq_questions_q8_title: Do I really own the code completely at the end?
faq_questions_q8_content:
Yes. After project completion, the complete code belongs 100% to you. The entire repository can be handed over to you. You can:
  • continue working with raspb
  • hire another service provider
  • develop internally
  • end the project

‚Äì without hidden rights or convoluted terms of use. During development, raspb retains control to avoid chaos, but there is no vendor lock-in.
faq_questions_q9_title: How does raspb use AI ‚Äì and is it really safe and high-quality?
faq_questions_q9_content: AI at raspb is a tool, not an end in itself. It is used to significantly accelerate design, code, testing, and documentation ‚Äì always within a controlled environment and with an experienced developer as "human in the loop." Critical areas such as security, architecture, data modeling, and performance are deliberately not blindly left to AI. The result: significantly faster implementation, but with a quality and security level that suits productive business systems.
faq_questions_q10_title: What about data protection, GDPR, and legal matters?
faq_questions_q10_content: raspb ensures that the services and integrations used can be operated in compliance with data protection regulations (e.g., data processing agreements, data-minimizing configuration, cookie consent, logging). Legal texts (imprint, privacy policy, terms and conditions if applicable) can be integrated through specialized providers or existing lawyers. Tracking, analytics, and third-party services are integrated in a way that is compatible with your data protection concept. In short: You don‚Äôt get a "black box solution," but a transparent, legally conscious implementation.
faq_questions_q11_title: Do you also offer maintenance, support, and further development after the project is finished?
faq_questions_q11_content: Yes. raspb offers optional maintenance contracts with a clear scope of services: hosting & monitoring, security updates, bug fixes, and a monthly allowance for minor enhancements or content adjustments. Through your customer dashboard, you can request new features, report bugs, or start follow-up projects at any time. You decide whether you want to manage the system yourself or have raspb keep the reins permanently.
faq_questions_q12_title: What happens if I want to switch providers or develop my project internally later?
faq_questions_q12_content: That‚Äôs exactly what the model is designed for: The code is cleanly structured, based on modern web technologies, and can be understood and taken over by other developers. You don‚Äôt have to "buy your way out" and are not tied to a specific platform. If desired, raspb even supports you during the handover ‚Äì for example, through technical documentation, training your team, or preparing the repository for the new partner.
faq_questions_q13_title: What types of projects or industries do you decline?
faq_questions_q13_content: raspb has clear boundaries: Projects from the defense industry (with the exception of sporting weapons), pornography, extremist or discriminatory content, as well as ventures that harm people or animals are fundamentally rejected. Likewise, projects that don‚Äôt fit the technical or organizational focus (e.g., classic native desktop/mobile apps without web relevance). This stance is deliberately chosen ‚Äì it creates clarity and trust on both sides.
faq_questions_q14_title: I already have a website or application. Can you take over or extend something existing?
faq_questions_q14_content: In many cases, raspb first analyzes your existing solution: What can be meaningfully reused, and where does a clean restart on a modern foundation make sense? Some systems can be usefully connected via API or interface, while others hold you back permanently. The goal is always a solution that remains maintainable, performant, and affordable in the long term ‚Äì if necessary, through the path of "rebuilding with clean migration" rather than patchwork.
faq_questions_q15_title: I don‚Äôt know much about technology and AI ‚Äì can I still work with you?
faq_questions_q15_content: Absolutely. You bring your business, your goals, and your expertise ‚Äì raspb translates that into technology. Everything is explained in plain language, without buzzword bingo. You decide for yourself how deeply you want to get into the technical side: from "just make it work" to training sessions where you can later manage content, users, or workflows yourself. The goal is always: You are empowered rather than dependent.

privacyNotice_section1_generalNotes_text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. Detailed information on data protection can be found in our privacy policy listed below this text.
privacyNotice_section1_dataCollection_re: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the "Information on the Responsible Party" section of this privacy policy.
privacyNotice_section1_dataCollection_ho: How do we collect your data?
Your data is collected, on the one hand, by you providing it to us. This may include, for example, data that you enter into a contact form.

Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website by our IT systems. This is primarily technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page view). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter this website.
privacyNotice_section1_dataCollection_pu: What do we use your data for?
Part of the data is collected to ensure a flawless provision of the website. Other data can be used to analyze your user behavior.
privacyNotice_section1_dataCollection_ri: What rights do you have regarding your data?

You have the right at any time to receive free information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data. You also have a right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. Furthermore, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. You also have a right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
privacyNotice_section2_netlify_text1: We host our website with Netlify. The provider is Netlify, Inc., 2325 3rd Street, Suite 296, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA (hereinafter "Netlify").
privacyNotice_section2_netlify_text2: When you visit our website, Netlify collects various log files including your IP addresses. Details can be found in Netlify's privacy policy:
privacyNotice_section2_netlify_text3: The use of Netlify is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in a reliable presentation of our website.
privacyNotice_section3_dataProtection_te: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations as well as this privacy policy.

When you use this website, various personal data are collected. Personal data are data with which you can be personally identified. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and what we use it for. It also explains how and for what purpose this happens.
privacyNotice_section3_responsibleBody_t: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
The responsible party is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others decides on the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g., names, email addresses, etc.).
privacyNotice_section3_storageDuration_t: Unless a more specific storage period has been specified within this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for data processing ceases to apply. If you assert a legitimate request for deletion or revoke your consent to data processing, your data will be deleted, unless we have other legally permissible reasons for storing your personal data (e.g., tax or commercial law retention periods); in the latter case, deletion will take place after these reasons cease to apply.
privacyNotice_section3_withdrawalOfConse: Withdrawal of Your Consent to Data Processing

Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You can revoke consent you have already given at any time. The legality of the data processing carried out until the revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.
privacyNotice_section3_rightToComplain_t: Right to Lodge a Complaint with the Competent Supervisory Authority

In the event of violations of the GDPR, data subjects have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the Member State of their habitual residence, their place of work, or the place of the alleged infringement. The right to complain exists without prejudice to other administrative or judicial remedies.
privacyNotice_section3_rightToDataPortab: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format. If you request the direct transfer of the data to another controller, this will only be done if it is technically feasible.
privacyNotice_section4_cookies_text1: Our internet pages use so-called "cookies". Cookies are small text files and do not cause any damage to your device. They are stored either temporarily for the duration of a session (session cookies) or permanently (permanent cookies) on your device. Session cookies are automatically deleted after your visit. Permanent cookies remain stored on your device until you delete them yourself or an automatic deletion occurs by your web browser.
privacyNotice_section4_cookies_text2: In some cases, cookies from third-party companies may also be stored on your device when you enter our site (third-party cookies). These enable us or you to use certain services of the third-party company (e.g., cookies for processing payment services).
privacyNotice_section4_cookies_text3: Cookies have various functions. Many cookies are technically necessary because certain website functions would not work without them (e.g., the shopping cart function or the display of videos). Other cookies are used to evaluate user behavior or to display advertising.
privacyNotice_section4_cookies_text4: Cookies that are required to carry out the electronic communication process, to provide certain functions you desire (e.g., for the shopping cart function) or to optimize the website (e.g., cookies for measuring the web audience) are stored on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR, unless another legal basis is specified. The website operator has a legitimate interest in the storage of necessary cookies for the technically flawless and optimized provision of its services. If consent to the storage of cookies and comparable recognition technologies has been requested, processing is carried out exclusively on the basis of this consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR and ¬ß 25 para. 1 TTDSG); consent can be revoked at any time.
privacyNotice_section4_serverLogFiles_te: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are:
This data is not merged with other data sources.

The collection of this data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. The website operator has a legitimate interest in the technically flawless presentation and optimization of its website - for this purpose, the server log files must be collected.
privacyNotice_section4_contactForm_text1: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provided there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and for the event of follow-up questions. We will not pass on this data without your consent.
privacyNotice_section4_contactForm_text2: The processing of this data takes place on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR, if your inquiry is related to the fulfillment of a contract or is necessary for the implementation of pre-contractual measures. In all other cases, the processing is based on our legitimate interest in the effective processing of inquiries addressed to us (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR) or on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR) if this has been requested; consent can be revoked at any time.

privacyNotice_section7_text: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy so that it always complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g., when introducing new services. The new privacy policy will then apply to your renewed visit.
privacyNotice_generalNotice_text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data by which you can be personally identified. Detailed information on data protection can be found in our privacy policy listed below.

Define features, structure and design, as well as content for each page or special requests. Projects captured here can be commissioned directly, and results are available in record time.

getStarted_wizardSelection_basicConfigur: Quickly get an approximate price estimate. The Basic Configurator can serve as a first indicator and is done in 1 minute.
getStarted_wizardSelection_advancedConfi: Capture your entire project in detail. Manage the result in your personal dashboard.
getStarted_registrationPrompt_descriptio: Would you like to configure your project in detail and make it more concrete? To use the advanced wizard and save your project, please create an account.
This will give you access to your personal dashboard, where you can manage multiple projects. Your email address is sufficient for registration.
wizard_stepCategory_titleSecond: Which direction are we going to take?
wizard_stepCategory_teaser: Is your idea a typical website or web application project? Or are you looking into a more individual or specialized approach? Please choose the category first.
wizard_stepType_teaser: Let us refine your vision a bit. Choose the appropriate option!
wizard_stepSubType_teaser: What kind of {project} would you like to tackle?

wizard_stepFeatures_teaser: The more detailed you specify the expected scope here, the more accurate and reliable the price estimate can be!
wizard_stepBasicDetails_titleSecond: and your idea in more detail
wizard_stepBasicDetails_teaser: It helps us a lot to better understand your expectations and estimate an appropriate budget if you provide some details here.
wizard_stepContent_titleSecond: and your idea in more detail
wizard_stepContent_teaser: It helps us a lot to better understand your expectations and estimate an appropriate price if you provide some details here.
wizard_stepSummary_teaser: Here you get a first assessment of your project. This is how we understood it, and these are the costs to expect for a professional implementation.
wizard_categories_websitesAndApps_descri: Take off directly: Whether one-pager, standard corporate website, large content site or complex web application. You're in the right place.
wizard_categories_kiAndFreestyle_descrip: Complicated or complex: If your project is more specialized, you can request your individual development project or AI solutions here.
wizard_type_website_description: Any format, any scope. You need a great website with or without content management? Individual & Professional!
wizard_type_app_description: You need a simple web app, complex business application or PWA? Your existing website as an app? Then this is the way to go.
wizard_type_aiSolution: AI ‚Äì the superpower for your business
wizard_type_aiSolution_description: You want to use AI profitably in your company? Start a concrete AI project? Agents, bots, workflows? This way...
wizard_type_freestyle_description: You have a very special project in mind? Something that doesn't fit anywhere else? We can help you here too. The solution: custom development.
wizard_subTypes_onepager_description: Is a single page without bells and whistles enough for you? Do you simply want to be reachable under your own domain? Or do you need a maintenance page? Get your basic information (e.g. opening hours) online quickly and easily.
wizard_subTypes_onepagerPlus_description: Classic one-pager. On a single page (with anchor navigation) all information about a topic, product, event, etc. is presented. Use this option for an affordable and straightforward campaign page (landing page).
wizard_subTypes_corporateWebsite_descrip: The absolute standard. A professional and secure corporate presence on the internet. Up to 5 individual content pages, legal notice, privacy policy, contact form, GDPR compliance... Hosting and maintenance for one year are already included.
wizard_subTypes_corporateWebsitePlus_des: Every website project is always individual, enriched with a variety of features. If it's clear upfront that the project will be larger (30+ content pages, diverse functionality and integrations), then the Corporate Website Plus package is the right choice.
wizard_subTypes_cms_description: Content management isn't always necessary, but usually makes sense. It can range from simple maintenance of individual sections or objects of an existing website to highly complex and extensive setups. Start your CMS project here.
wizard_subTypes_cmsPlus_description: Editorial systems with many individual information objects or headless use of content modules. We also offer the implementation of individual and complex CMS solutions. Choose this option if your CMS project is larger.
wizard_subTypes_webApp_description: Websites and web applications are quite similar. Under the hood, web applications are usually much more complex (data, interfaces, permissions). Whether performance dashboard, control center or mini portal ‚Äì we develop the best solution for you.
wizard_subTypes_pwaSimple_description: A PWA is the best way to turn a website or web application into a versatile mobile app. It's installable, works offline and can access device features (location, camera, sensors, etc.).
wizard_subTypes_pwaExtended_description: The simple PWA option includes upgrading an existing website to a Progressive Web App. If you want to start from scratch and implement complex functions and use cases, it becomes a completely different project.
wizard_subTypes_individualApp_descriptio: A web application can also be very individual. We help you implement even the wildest ideas. With our approach, we deliver the perfect foundation that can be flexibly expanded into something truly great.
wizard_subTypes_aiConsulting_description: Whether on-site workshop, analysis of optimizable processes in your company or assistance with specific challenges. Strategic AI consulting is available here.
wizard_subTypes_agenticAi_description: Your own AI that is capable of acting independently in complex environments and making decisions. Let's build your own specialized AI agent together.
wizard_subTypes_generativeAi: Generative AI - Digital Assets in No Time
wizard_subTypes_generativeAi_description: Text, images, audio, video, code, data and much more can be generated with AI more easily than ever. Build your own generative AI with us that doesn't guess, but produces results in your style.
wizard_subTypes_bots_description: Dialog-based chat systems have been around for a while. We take it a step further with AI and implement virtual customer advisors, salespeople, support agents, etc. ‚Äì that talk to you and understand you!
wizard_subTypes_workflowAutomation_descr: Thanks to AI, business processes can be automated much more effectively. Onboarding new employees, order processes, accounting, reports, etc. ‚Äì there are 1,000 use cases. Which one is yours?
wizard_subTypes_individualAi_description: The power of AI ‚Äì when used correctly ‚Äì brings enormous potential. Core applications are quickly identified, but there are so many possibilities to get creative with AI. Start your individual AI project.
wizard_subTypes_individualConsulting_des: Are you looking for expert support for a project? Or completely individual consulting on IT topics? Want to rent expertise instead of hiring? Book IT experts by the day for your freestyle project here.
wizard_subTypes_fullDevelopment_descript: Do you want to have larger individual projects implemented holistically, or bind resources long-term in demanding development projects? This is the right path.
wizard_subTypes_partDevelopment_descript: We also develop individual components, modules, frontends, UIs, libraries, etc. ‚Äì for small but specialized, individual development tasks, choose this option.
wizard_features_contactForm_description: A custom contact form that captures all inquiries.
wizard_features_newsletterRegistration_d: Newsletter sign-up with email validation and double opt-in
wizard_features_chatbot_description: AI-powered chatbot for customer service and consulting
wizard_features_voicebot_description: AI-powered voicebot for customer service and consulting
wizard_features_appointments_description: Online appointment booking system with calendar integration
wizard_features_imageGallery_description: Responsive image gallery with lightbox functionality and categorization
wizard_features_videoEmbedding_descripti: Responsive video embedding with player controls
wizard_features_portfolioGrid_descriptio: Responsive portfolio grid for showcasing work
wizard_features_calendar_description: Interactive calendar with event management and appointment display
wizard_features_fileUpload_description: Secure file upload functionality with validation and preview
wizard_features_megaMenu_description: Advanced navigation with multi-level dropdown menus
wizard_features_customTeaser_description: Custom teaser components for content and products
wizard_features_customCarousel_descripti: Custom carousel component for images and content
wizard_features_accordeon_description: Collapsible content sections for FAQ and structured content
wizard_features_tabs_description: Tab navigation for clear content presentation
wizard_features_themeSwitcher_descriptio: Dark/Light mode toggle and custom theme selection
wizard_features_search_description: Intelligent search function for website content with filter options
wizard_features_customFilter_description: Advanced filter functions for product catalogs and content
wizard_features_multiStepDialog_descript: Multi-step forms and dialogs for complex inputs
wizard_features_assistant_description: Digital assistant for user guidance and help
wizard_features_rating_description: Rating and review system for products or services
wizard_features_payment_description: Secure online payment processing with various payment providers
wizard_features_userAccounts_description: User management with registration, login and profile management
wizard_features_ageVerification_descript: Age verification system for age-restricted content
wizard_features_accessibility_descriptio: Accessibility features for better usability and WCAG compliance
wizard_features_mapsIntegration_descript: Google Maps, Mapbox or OpenStreetMap integration with location markers
wizard_features_socialMediaIntegration_d: Integration of social media feeds and sharing buttons
wizard_features_analyticsIntegration_des: Integration of Google Analytics, Matomo or other tracking tools
wizard_features_seo_description: Search engine optimization with meta tags, schema markup and performance
wizard_features_marketingTools_descripti: A/B testing, conversion tracking and marketing automation
wizard_features_localization_description: Multilingual support with automatic language detection
wizard_features_virtualTour_description: Map your premises in 3D and make them accessible on your website

wizard_form_placeholders_webApplication: Describe in detail the desired functions and features of your application: What main functions should it have? How should users interact with it? What data will be processed? Are there special requirements for performance or security?

wizard_basic_timeline_option_urgent: As soon as possible - Time is critical
wizard_basic_timeline_option_fast: Very fast - can wait a few days/weeks
wizard_basic_timeline_option_delayed: Slow start - conception not yet ready
wizard_basic_pwa_title: You have selected a PWA - Progressive Web Application
wizard_basic_pwa_description1: The perfect choice for a fast, flexible application with more functionality than a website, but less complexity than native iOS or Android apps.
wizard_basic_pwa_description2: The question remains: Do you want to upgrade an existing website or web application to a PWA, or should a corresponding application be developed from scratch?
wizard_basic_pwa_extend_description: Extend an existing website or app to a PWA
wizard_basic_cms_description: A CMS enables comfortable content management ‚Äì from a single editable page to complex editorial systems with hundreds of objects, permissions, and special functions.
wizard_basic_cms_structure_placeholder: e.g. What types of content should be managed? How many pages/objects? What permissions?
wizard_basic_service_description: How much do you want to contribute yourself? Do you provide structured content, images, and assets, or should we take over everything ‚Äì from texts to design to conception?
wizard_basic_service_level1: Complete Full-Service ‚Äì you take over everything
wizard_basic_service_level4: I deliver a lot, you support
wizard_basic_service_hint: üí° The more you contribute yourself, the lower the costs.
wizard_basic_engineering_description: A small corporate website doesn't need the security features of online banking. What is more important to you: fast, cheap, and innovative, or bullet-proof, highly secure, and highly available?
wizard_basic_engineering_level2: Solid basis with focus on speed
wizard_basic_requirements_description: Are there external systems or services that need to be connected? Special requirements that set your project apart from the standard?
wizard_basic_requirements_placeholder: e.g. Integration with ERP system, special API connections, accessibility, multilingual...
wizard_basic_goal_description: Describe the goal precisely: What do you want to achieve? Can it be measured? When is the implementation considered a success?
wizard_basic_goal_placeholder: e.g. 100 new leads per month, 50% fewer support inquiries, successful product launch...
wizard_basic_audience_description: Which group of people will work with your website/application? Do you know their needs?
wizard_basic_audience_placeholder: e.g. B2B customers, end consumers 25-45 years, technically savvy users, international audience...
wizard_basic_timeline_description: How urgent is the project? Is there a specific timeframe or deadline?
wizard_basic_budget_description: To ensure that the expected scope of functions fits your budget, a rough estimate helps us. There might also be room for additional features!
wizard_basic_freestyle_description: Freestyle and AI projects are not fixed-price projects, but are billed according to Time, Material & Effort. We estimate the complexity and book a contingent of man-days. If this is used up, re-budgeting is possible ‚Äì remaining resources are distributed or paid out.
wizard_basic_freestyle_info_suffix: and use them as you see fit.
